name: SimpliciTI Simple Layer
short_description:
Welcome,

This layer is used to simply create RF 802.15.4 project's using SimpliciTI Stack(http://www.ti.com/tool/simpliciti). The simple Layer works on top of SimpliciTI Stack. The objectives of this Stack are the following:

    -Initialize successfully SimpliciTi Stack (Using metaprograming to generate diferent code for End Device , Access Points and Range Extender's)
    -Create a Simple Interface for interacting with the PAN Network
        -Using the Socket's abstraction
    -Create a nice "on the fly" support for Debugging purposes (Using Serial Port)
    -Automatic antenna Power management
summary: Simple Layer for interacting with Texas SimpliciTI Stack
